channel.title: Jarring
channel.description: which files do i jar when i make the webclient, all i get is error loading please report, and i've changed the cache dl link from the server, and ive deleted everything but the java and class files out of the client including the .classpath and .project, it was a back up client, can any1 explain the process of which files to jar because it won't work :s

item.dc:creator: @mage_pwns mage pwns
item.description:

i have just tried that, it doesnt work :S

Read full topic

mage pwns:

yeahh, if the cache is there it lets me log in and works fine, just wont dl the cache :s

Upload the cache to FileDen.

item.title: Jarring
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Don’t use dropbox, it is not reliable. Use FileDen, or a free webhost, like 000webhost. Also, is that the only problem you are having - the cache download part?

Edit: I just re-read the post again (sorry for not paying attention)and this is like the 3rd topic I’ve seen today about jarring. If you are getting an error when you try to run the client it could be caused by the following:

[ul][li]Failure to unpack[/li]
[li]Cache was not downloaded[/li]
[li]Directories were not fixed right[/li][/ul]

Also, make sure you don’t zip the actually cache folder, but the contents.

Read full topic
